octomod:InkBottle.NAME: Ink Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yoctomod:Choose each combat, #yoctomod:Choose #b1 additional time.

octomod:Inkjector.NAME: Inkjector
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL The first time you #yoctomod:Choose each turn, #yoctomod:Choose #b1 additional time.

octomod:Blindfold.NAME: Fake Beard
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot read choices.
